name: DOOM'd
description:
This game is inspired by Doom, but not at all the same. The gameplay is very short and quick and can be enjoyed without too much stress. The game features a normal mode with 10 levels to complete and an endless mode as well!

Come and try to set your best record in score and timing!

Feel free to submit your scores and share them on our Discord server:
https://discord.gg/GBShTKf
